entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Not saying #America shouldn't CAUTIOUSLY reopen, but @realDonaldTrump & Cabinet act like #COVID19 is history. It isn't, and nothing should open w/o consideration for the #safety of our #People! #POTUS #Trump #TrumpOut2020
